org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.service

Interface UsersService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UsersServiceImpl

    public interface UsersService
    Author:
    FITZPATRICK

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String createGroup(String groupName)
      Create a group with the specified group name.
      void createOrUpdateUser(User user)
      Create a new user or update an existing user.
      boolean deleteGroup(String id)
      Delete the specified group, along with any user memberships in that group

    • Method Detail

      • createGroup

        String createGroup(String groupName)
        Create a group with the specified group name.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group
        Returns:
        the system assigned Id of the group. In practice, same as the group name.

      • createOrUpdateUser

        void createOrUpdateUser(User user)
        Create a new user or update an existing user. The implementation may optionally delete the user and create a new record with the same attributes.
        Parameters:
        user - the user

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(String id)
        Delete the specified user. If the user does not exist, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        id - the user Id.
        Returns:
        true if the user existed and was deleted, false if no such user

      • findAllGroups

        List<Group> findAllGroups()
        Find all groups
        Returns:
        the list of groups

      • findAllUsers

        List<User> findAllUsers()
        Finds all users in the system
        Returns:
        a list of all users

      • findGroup

        Group findGroup(String id)
        Find a single group by Id
        Parameters:
        id - the group Id
        Returns:
        the group

      • findUser

        User findUser(String id)
        Find a single user by Id
        Parameters:
        id - the user Id
        Returns:
        the user or null if not found

      • deleteGroup

        boolean deleteGroup(String id)
        Delete the specified group, along with any user memberships in that group
        Parameters:
        id - the group id
        Returns:
        true if the group existed and was deleted, false if no such group exists
